content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(41.0, -82.0) and two Chests at positions (40.5, -83.5) and (41.5, -83.5)

### Coal Transport at position(39.5, -81.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(39.5, -81.5) connected to the Burner Mining Drill at position(41.0, -82.0)

### Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0) with no connected entities

# ERROR TIPS
* Errors when chest is full: Ensure the chest has enough space to hold the items before attempting to drop items into it
* Errors when inserter has no source items: Ensure the inserter has a source of items to pick up before attempting to operate
* Errors when furnace has no ingredients: Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before attempting to operate

# NAMESPACE
* Important variables:
  + `coal`: Ingredient
  + `wooden-chest`: Entity
  + `burner-mining-drill`: Entity
  + `burner-inserter`: Entity
  + `stone-furnace`: Entity
* Utility functions:
  + None defined in this report period
* Failure modes:
  + Chest is full: The Burner Mining Drill was unable to drop items into the chest because it was full
  + Inserter has no source items: The Burner Inserter was unable to operate because it had no source of items to pick up
  + Furnace has no ingredients: The Furnace was unable to operate because it had no ingredients to smelt
